Title: Relates to enacting the environmentally conscious purchasing act
Summary: Relates to enacting the "environmentally conscious purchasing act"; prohibits state agencies and political subdivisions from purchasing single-use plastic products; defines terms; provides exceptions for medical reasons and garbage collection.
LawCode: Amd ยง165, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the state finance law, in relation to enacting the "environmentally conscious purchasing act"
